Visit the <a href="https://community.tinymce.com/forum/" target="_blank">Community Forum</a>.</li><li>We also offer enterprise grade support as part of <a href="https://www.tiny.cloud/pricing">TinyMCE Enterprise</a>.</li></ul><h2>A simple table to play with</h2><table style="text-align:center;"><thead><tr><th>Product</th><th>Cost</th><th>Really?</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>TinyMCE</td><td>Free</td><td>YES!</td></tr><tr><td>Plupload</td><td>Free</td><td>YES!</td></tr></tbody></table><h2>Found a bug?</h2><p>If you think you have found a bug please create an issue on the <a href="https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce/issues">GitHub repo</a> to report it to the developers.</p><h2>Finally ...</h2><p>Don´t forget to check out our other product <a href="http://www.plupload.com" target="_blank">Plupload</a>, your ultimate upload solution featuring HTML5 upload support.</p><p>Thanks for supporting TinyMCE! We hope it helps you and your users create great content.<br>All the best from the TinyMCE team.</p>
